Class.Name: DurationNodeable
Class.Description: Triggers a signal every frame during the specified duration.

Parameter.Name: Duration
Parameter.Description: The amount of time to delay before the Done is signalled.

Output.Name: OnTick
Output.Description: Signaled every frame while the duration is active.

Parameter.Name: Elapsed
Parameter.Description: The amount of time that has elapsed since the countdown began.

Output.Name: Done
Output.Description: Signaled after waiting for the specified amount of times.
